changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.subtitle: Password must be 10-40 characters, must contain lower case, upper case, number, and special characters (@#$%^&+=)

errorMessage.empty: Current password must not be empty
New password must not be empty
errorMessage.passMin: New password must be at least 10 characters

errorMessage.empty: Confirm password must not be empty
errorMessage.notMatch: Password and confirm password do not match
errorMessage.passMin: Confirm password must be at least 10 characters

revokeConfirmation.title: Revoke Certificate?
revokeConfirmation.subtitle:
By revoking the certificate, your certificate will be 
 removed from the Tilaka system. To perform digital 
 signatures, you must undergo re-enroll process to 
 issue a new certificate
revokeConfirmation.subtitle1:
By revoking the certificate, your certificate 
 will be removed from the Tilaka system. To 
 perform digital signatures, you must undergo 
 re-enroll process to issue a new certificate

certificateContent.title: Linked Account
certificateContent.subtitle: To change Users Data, please contact Administrator

step1.subject: Subject

step2.header: You have placed <signature></signature> Signature area for <signers></signers> Signers
step2.header2: Set the signature position on the document for each signer

sendDocModal.title: Send Signing Request
sendDocModal.subtitle:
The signing request will be sent according to

pre-defined signer(s) and their respective signature position(s)

SigningDialog.reviewDoc: Please review the document below and sign it accordingly

signingOptionModal.title: Signing Option
signingOptionModal.subtitle: Here is the signature summary for this document

signingDoneDrawer.title: All done!
signingDoneDrawer.subtitle: Double check your document and signature, and click 'Sign' to complete signing process

otpDialog.subtitle:
Input 6-digit OTP code that has been sent to

isuwinxxx@gmail.com

frDialog.title: Signing Confirmation
frDialog.subtitle: Face towards the camera for authentication

signingSuccessToast.title: Signing Success
signingSuccessToast.subtitle: Document(s) has been signed and forwarded to the next signer and signer

SigningDialog.signingAuthenticationDialog: Select your authentication method to continue the document signing process

certExpiredDialog.content: Your certificate is valid until 29 Feb 2024. Click the button below to create a new certificate

issuanceOnProcessDialog.content: Certificate issuance is in progress. Please check your email periodically for issuance

certRevokedDialog.content:
Your certificate is revoked/expired. 
 Click the button below to create

offlineDialog.title: You Are Offline
offlineDialog.subtitle:
Recheck the connection used 
 to access the Tilaka system

cannotAccessCameraDialog.title: Cannot Access Camera
cannotAccessCameraDialog.subtitle:
Tilaka requires access to your camera. 
 Click the camera <icon></icon> in your browser 
 to grant camera access.

deviceNotSupportedDialog.title: Device Not Supported
deviceNotSupportedDialog.subtitle: Camera not found or not allowed. Continue the liveness process by using the provided link on antoher device

autoLoggedOutDialog.subtitle1: Your login session has expired. Please enter your Tilaka Name and Password to re-login

changeSignatureDialog.title: Change Signature
changeSignatureDialog.subtitle: For good quality signatures, upload images in .JPG/.JPEG/.PNG format with a transparent or white background
